domain.name: Music Genre

text:
@TMobile @Tesla I unemployed due to Covid19. But I do love in sunny Florida. I would take it down A1A with my trusty companion Riley (my dog). She would have the wind blowing in her hair as I listen to my favorite rock songs. 
It would be a very sweet ride.
